languages.text: "И, конечно, все без умолку обсуждают Немезита. Литейка, часовня — самое громкое, но вообще он люду то там, то тут помогает. Многие держатся теперь его. Зуб даю, а у меня их мало осталось, даже если его кто найдет — не выдаст".

traits.locale_text: "И, конечно, все без умолку обсуждают славные деяния Немезита. Литейка — лишь самое громкое, но вообще он люду то там, то тут помогает. Держатся теперь его. Зуб даю, а у меня их мало осталось, даже если его кто найдет — не выдаст".

languages.text: "And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. Sure, the foundry and the chapel were big, but he's been helping people all over. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. You can knock my teeth out if I'm lying — don't got many of those left anyhow — but I'll tell you this: even if someone finds him, they won't rat him out."
languages.original_text: "И, конечно, все без умолку обсуждают Немезита. Литейка, часовня — самое громкое, но вообще он люду то там, то тут помогает. Многие держатся теперь его. Зуб даю, а у меня их мало осталось, даже если его кто найдет — не выдаст".

traits.locale_text: "And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. The foundry and the chapel are on the tip of everyone's tongue, but he keeps helping people here and there. A lot of folks are sticking to him now. I swear on my teeth, and I do not have many of these left. Even if someone does manage to find him, do not expect them to tattle."

"And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. The foundry and the chapel are on the tip of everyone's tongue, but he keeps helping people here and there. A lot of folks are sticking to him now. I swear on my teeth, and I do not have many of these left. Even if someone does manage to find him, do not expect them to tattle."

"And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. The foundry and the chapel are on the tip of everyone's tongue, but he keeps helping people here and there. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. I swear on my teeth, and I do not have many of these left: even if someone does manage to find him, do not expect them to tattle."

"And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. The foundry and the chapel are on the tip of everyone's tongue, but he keeps helping people here and there. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. I swear on my teeth, and I do not have many of these left: even if someone does manage to find him, do not expect them to tattle."

"And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. Sure, the foundry and the chapel were big, but he's been helping people all over. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. You can knock my teeth out if I'm lying — don't got many of those left anyhow — but I'll tell you this: even if someone finds him, they won't rat him out."

"And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. Sure, the foundry and the chapel were big, but he's been helping people all over. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. You can knock my teeth out if I'm lying — don't got many of those left anyhow — but I'll tell you this: even if someone finds him, they won't rat him out."

languages.text: "Und natürlich reden alle von Nemesit. Gewiss, die Gießerei und die Kapelle waren groß, aber er hilft den Leuten an vielen Orten. Viele Leute stehen ihm jetzt bei. Ihr könnt mir die Zähne herausschlagen, wenn ich lüge ... ich habe sowieso nicht mehr viele ... aber eines sage ich Euch: Selbst wenn ihn jemanden findet, sie würden ihn nicht verraten."
languages.original_text: "And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. Sure, the foundry and the chapel were big, but he's been helping people all over. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. You can knock my teeth out if I'm lying — don't got many of those left anyhow — but I'll tell you this: even if someone finds him, they won't rat him out."

traits.locale_text: "Und natürlich reden alle von Nemesit. Gewiss, die Gießerei und die Kapelle waren groß, aber er hilft den Leuten an vielen Orten. Viele Leute stehen ihm jetzt bei. Ihr könnt mir die Zähne herausschlagen, wenn ich lüge ... ich habe sowieso nicht mehr viele ... aber eines sage ich Euch: Selbst wenn ihn jemanden findet, sie würden ihn nicht verraten."

languages.text: «Y, por supuesto, todo el mundo está hablando de Nemesitio. Sí, lo de la fundición y la capilla ha sido gordo, pero ha estado ayudando a la gente por todas partes. Y ahora tiene mucha gente afín. Sácame los dientes a golpes si quieres, no me quedan muchos, pero te diré esto: aunque alguien dé con él, no lo delatará».
languages.original_text: "And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. Sure, the foundry and the chapel were big, but he's been helping people all over. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. You can knock my teeth out if I'm lying — don't got many of those left anyhow — but I'll tell you this: even if someone finds him, they won't rat him out."

traits.locale_text: «Y, por supuesto, todo el mundo está hablando de Nemesitio. Sí, lo de la fundición y la capilla ha sido gordo, pero ha estado ayudando a la gente por todas partes. Y ahora tiene mucha gente afín. Sácame los dientes a golpes si quieres, no me quedan muchos, pero te diré esto: aunque alguien dé con él, no lo delatará».

languages.text: 「それに、もちろん、誰もがネメサイトの話をしてる。確かに鋳造所とチャペルは大きかったが、奴は至る所で人々を助けてきた。今、多くの連中が奴に注目しているんだ。嘘をついたなら歯を折ってくれてもかまわないが…どうせ大して残ってないんだ。でも、これだけは言っておく。誰かが奴を見つけても、誰も密告はしないだろうさ」
languages.original_text: "And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. Sure, the foundry and the chapel were big, but he's been helping people all over. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. You can knock my teeth out if I'm lying — don't got many of those left anyhow — but I'll tell you this: even if someone finds him, they won't rat him out."

traits.locale_text: 「それに、もちろん、誰もがネメサイトの話をしてる。確かに鋳造所とチャペルは大きかったが、奴は至る所で人々を助けてきた。今、多くの連中が奴に注目しているんだ。嘘をついたなら歯を折ってくれてもかまわないが…どうせ大して残ってないんだ。でも、これだけは言っておく。誰かが奴を見つけても、誰も密告はしないだろうさ」

languages.text: “当然了，每个人都在谈论涅墨斯特的事情。没错，铸造甲板和礼拜堂都很大，但他一直在帮助别人，走到哪帮到哪。现在，这里有很多人支持他。要是我撒谎的话，你尽管把我的牙打掉，反正也没几颗了，但我得告诉你们，就算真的有人知道他的下落，那些人也绝对不会出卖他。”
languages.original_text: "And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. Sure, the foundry and the chapel were big, but he's been helping people all over. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. You can knock my teeth out if I'm lying — don't got many of those left anyhow — but I'll tell you this: even if someone finds him, they won't rat him out."

traits.locale_text: “当然了，每个人都在谈论涅墨斯特的事情。没错，铸造甲板和礼拜堂都很大，但他一直在帮助别人，走到哪帮到哪。现在，这里有很多人支持他。要是我撒谎的话，你尽管把我的牙打掉，反正也没几颗了，但我得告诉你们，就算真的有人知道他的下落，那些人也绝对不会出卖他。”

languages.text: « Et bien sûr, tout le monde parle de Némésite. La fonderie et la chapelle, c'était déjà quelque chose, mais il semblerait qu'il ait aidé des gens un peu partout, ce qui lui a permis de gagner beaucoup de soutien. Qu'on m'arrache mes dents si je mens ! De toute façon, c'est pas comme s'il m'en restait beaucoup. Mais je vous le dis : même si quelqu'un découvrait qui c'était, personne n'ira le dénoncer. »
languages.original_text: "And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. Sure, the foundry and the chapel were big, but he's been helping people all over. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. You can knock my teeth out if I'm lying — don't got many of those left anyhow — but I'll tell you this: even if someone finds him, they won't rat him out."

traits.locale_text: « Et bien sûr, tout le monde parle de Némésite. La fonderie et la chapelle, c'était déjà quelque chose, mais il semblerait qu'il ait aidé des gens un peu partout, ce qui lui a permis de gagner beaucoup de soutien. Qu'on m'arrache mes dents si je mens ! De toute façon, c'est pas comme s'il m'en restait beaucoup. Mais je vous le dis : même si quelqu'un découvrait qui c'était, personne n'ira le dénoncer. »

languages.text: "Bir de elbette herkes Nemezit'i konuşuyor. Dökümhane ve mabette büyük olaylar oldu, tamam ama o herkese yardım ediyor. Onu destekleyen çok fazla insan var. Yalan söylüyorsam ağzımın ortasına bir tane vurun da tüm dişlerim dökülsün. Çok kalmadı zaten. Şundan emin olun: Birisi onu bulsa bile gammazlamaz."
languages.original_text: "And, of course, everyone's talking about Nemesite. Sure, the foundry and the chapel were big, but he's been helping people all over. A lot of folks are sticking with him now. You can knock my teeth out if I'm lying — don't got many of those left anyhow — but I'll tell you this: even if someone finds him, they won't rat him out."
